Title: Suzumiya Haruhi-chan no Yuuutsu
Description: ['A parody series featuring the entire cast of ', The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, ' in a smaller form factor. Among the changes are: Yuki plays eroge, Haruhi is even more obnoxiuous and loud, Mikuru is even more emotional and Koizumi harbors a deep love for Kyon. Kyon, on the other hand, is generally the same as ever.']
Characters: ['Suzumiya, Haruhi', 'Kyon', 'Nagato, Yuki', 'Asahina, Mikuru', 'Koizumi, Itsuki', 'Tsuruya', 'Asakura, Ryouko', "Kyon's Sister", 'Kimidori-san', 'Achakura-san']
Voices: ['Hirano, Aya', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Chihara, Minori', 'Gotou, Yuuko', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Aoki, Sayaka', 'Shiraishi, Minoru', 'Kuwatani, Natsuko']
Staff: [['Takemoto, Yasuhiro', 'Director'], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', 'Sound Director'], ['Ono, Daisuke', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Theme Song Performance']]
